history.proof: intros r1 r2 H. split. - intros. hauto use: Rle_div_l, Rmult_1_l unfold: Rgt. - intros. apply Rle_div_l in H0; try auto. scongruence use: Rmult_1_l.

exceptions.tactic: apply Rle_div_r in H0; try auto.

original: intros r1 r2 H. split. - intros. apply Rle_div_r in H0; try auto. now rewrite Rdiv_Rmult in H0. - intros. rewrite Rdiv_Rmult. apply Rle_div_l in H0; try auto. apply H0.
